47 /* for INTEL_CXML, the second arg may need to be changed to 'one'. If so
48 the appropriate declaration of one will need to be added back into
49 functions that include the macro:
50 */
51 #if defined (INTEL_CXML)
52  unsigned int one=1;
53 #endif
54 
55 #ifdef CHAR_MACRO
56 #undef CHAR_MACRO
57 #endif
58 #if defined (INTEL_CXML)
59 #define CHAR_MACRO(char_var) &char_var, one
60 #else
61 #define CHAR_MACRO(char_var) &char_var
62 #endif

304  void LAPACK<int, float>::GEES(const char JOBVS, const int n, float* A, const int lda, int* sdim, float* WR, float* WI, float* VS, const int ldvs, float* WORK, const int lwork, float* RWORK, int* BWORK, int* info) const
305  {

307  const char sort = 'N';
308  SGEES_F77(CHAR_MACRO(JOBVS), CHAR_MACRO(sort), nullfptr, &n, A, &lda, sdim, WR, WI, VS, &ldvs, WORK, &lwork, BWORK, info);
309  }

332  void LAPACK<int, float>::ORMQR(const char SIDE, const char TRANS, const int m, const int n, const int k, float* A, const int lda, const float* TAU, float* C, const int ldc, float* WORK, const int lwork, int* info) const

334 
335  void LAPACK<int, float>::UNMQR(const char SIDE, const char TRANS, const int m, const int n, const int k, float* A, const int lda, const float* TAU, float* C, const int ldc, float* WORK, const int lwork, int* info) const
336  {
337  // LAPACK only defines UNMQR for Z and C (complex*8
338  // resp. complex*16), but logically, UNMQR means the same thing as
339  // ORMQR for real arithmetic.
340  ORMQR (SIDE, TRANS, m, n, k, A, lda, TAU, C, ldc, WORK, lwork, info);
341  }
342

402 
403  int LAPACK<int, float>::ILAENV( const int ispec, const std::string& NAME, const std::string& OPTS, const int N1, const int N2, const int N3, const int N4 ) const
404  {
405  unsigned int opts_length = OPTS.length();
406  // if user queries a Hermitian routine, change it to a symmetric routine
407  std::string temp_NAME = "s" + NAME;
408  if (temp_NAME.substr(1,2) == "he") {
409  temp_NAME.replace(1,2,"sy");
410  }
411  unsigned int name_length = temp_NAME.length();
412 #if defined (INTEL_CXML)
413  return ::ILAENV_F77(&ispec, &temp_NAME[0], name_length, &OPTS[0], opts_length, &N1, &N2, &N3, &N4 );
414 #else
415  return ::ILAENV_F77(&ispec, &temp_NAME[0], &OPTS[0], &N1, &N2, &N3, &N4, name_length, opts_length );
416 #endif
417  }
418 
419 
420  float LAPACK<int, float>::LAPY2(const float x, const float y) const
421  {
422 #if defined(HAVE_TEUCHOS_BLASFLOAT)
423  return SLAPY2_F77(&x, &y);
424 #else
425  typedef ScalarTraits<float> ST;
426  const float xabs = ST::magnitude(x);
427  const float yabs = ST::magnitude(y);
428  const float w = TEUCHOS_MAX(xabs, yabs);
429  const float z = TEUCHOS_MIN(xabs, yabs);
430  if ( z == 0.0 ) {
431  return w;
432  }
433  const float z_over_w = z/w;
434  return w*ST::squareroot( 1.0+(z_over_w*z_over_w));
435 #endif
436  }

718  void LAPACK<int, double>::UNMQR(const char SIDE, const char TRANS, const int m, const int n, const int k, double* A, const int lda, const double* TAU, double* C, const int ldc, double* WORK, const int lwork, int* info) const
719  {
720  // LAPACK only defines UNMQR for Z and C (complex*8
721  // resp. complex*16), but logically, UNMQR means the same thing as
722  // ORMQR for real arithmetic.
723  ORMQR (SIDE, TRANS, m, n, k, A, lda, TAU, C, ldc, WORK, lwork, info);
724  }

812 
813  int LAPACK<int, double>::ILAENV( const int ispec, const std::string& NAME, const std::string& OPTS, const int N1, const int N2, const int N3, const int N4 ) const
814  {
815  unsigned int opts_length = OPTS.length();
816  // if user queries a Hermitian routine, change it to a symmetric routine
817  std::string temp_NAME = "d" + NAME;
818  if (temp_NAME.substr(1,2) == "he") {
819  temp_NAME.replace(1,2,"sy");
820  }
821  unsigned int name_length = temp_NAME.length();
822 #if defined(INTEL_CXML)
823  return ILAENV_F77(&ispec, &temp_NAME[0], name_length, &OPTS[0], opts_length, &N1, &N2, &N3, &N4 );
824 #else
825  return ::ILAENV_F77(&ispec, &temp_NAME[0], &OPTS[0], &N1, &N2, &N3, &N4, name_length, opts_length );
826 #endif
827  }

832  return DLAPY2_F77(&x, &y);
833  }

1113  void LAPACK<int, std::complex<float> >::GEES(const char JOBVS, const char SORT, int (*ptr2func)(std::complex<float>*), const int n, std::complex<float>* A, const int lda, int* sdim, std::complex<float>* W, std::complex<float>* VS, const int ldvs, std::complex<float>* WORK, const int lwork, float* RWORK, int* BWORK, int* info) const
1114  {
1115  CGEES_F77(CHAR_MACRO(JOBVS), CHAR_MACRO(SORT), ptr2func, &n, A, &lda, sdim, W, VS, &ldvs, WORK, &lwork, RWORK, BWORK, info);

1118 
1119  void LAPACK<int, std::complex<float> >::GEES(const char JOBVS, const int n, std::complex<float>* A, const int lda, int* sdim, float* WR, float* WI, std::complex<float>* VS, const int ldvs, std::complex<float>* WORK, const int lwork, float* RWORK, int* BWORK, int* info) const
1120  {
1121  int (*nullfptr)(std::complex<float>*) = NULL;
1122  std::vector< std::complex<float> > W(n);
1123  const char sort = 'N';
1124  CGEES_F77(CHAR_MACRO(JOBVS), CHAR_MACRO(sort), nullfptr, &n, A, &lda, sdim, &W[0], VS, &ldvs, WORK, &lwork, RWORK, BWORK, info);
1125  for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
1126  WR[i] = W[i].real();
1127  WI[i] = W[i].imag();
1128  }
1129  }

1498  void LAPACK<int, std::complex<double> >::GEES(const char JOBVS, const char SORT, int (*ptr2func)(std::complex<double>*), const int n, std::complex<double>* A, const int lda, int* sdim, std::complex<double>* W, std::complex<double>* VS, const int ldvs, std::complex<double>* WORK, const int lwork, double* RWORK, int* BWORK, int* info) const
1499  {
1500  ZGEES_F77(CHAR_MACRO(JOBVS), CHAR_MACRO(SORT), ptr2func, &n, A, &lda, sdim, W, VS, &ldvs, WORK, &lwork, RWORK, BWORK, info);
1501  }

1503 
1504  void LAPACK<int, std::complex<double> >::GEES(const char JOBVS, const int n, std::complex<double>* A, const int lda, int* sdim, double* WR, double* WI, std::complex<double>* VS, const int ldvs, std::complex<double>* WORK, const int lwork, double* RWORK, int* BWORK, int* info) const
1505  {
1506  int (*nullfptr)(std::complex<double>*) = NULL;
1507  std::vector< std::complex<double> > W(n);
1508  const char sort = 'N';
1509  ZGEES_F77(CHAR_MACRO(JOBVS), CHAR_MACRO(sort), nullfptr, &n, A, &lda, sdim, &W[0], VS, &ldvs, WORK, &lwork, RWORK, BWORK, info);
1510  for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {
1511  WR[i] = W[i].real();
1512  WI[i] = W[i].imag();
1513  }
1514  }
